description:
Change I1046576c448704841ae8e1800b8390e947b0d457 uses ExtensionManager.RegisterExtension, which requires the additional permission Extension.Register on the vSphere server. Unfortunately we missed the DocImpact in review. This needs to be added to the relevant docs.

The impact of not having this permission is that n-cpu fails to start with the error:

WebFault: Server raised fault: 'Permission to perform this operation was denied.'
title: VMware: New permission required: Extension.Register

comments.content:
Change I1046576c448704841ae8e1800b8390e947b0d457 uses ExtensionManager.RegisterExtension, which requires the additional permission Extension.Register on the vSphere server. Unfortunately we missed the DocImpact in review. This needs to be added to the relevant docs.

The impact of not having this permission is that n-cpu fails to start with the error:

WebFault: Server raised fault: 'Permission to perform this operation was denied.'
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mbooth-9

comments.content:
This hit me, and there is no obvious hint at the cause of the issue in the error.  It would be nice to see this fixed in the error message and possibly the doc.

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/168092
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/168092
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/openstack-manuals/commit/?id=85a96889e674e8c61feb5e2d361a48076342acdf
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 85a96889e674e8c61feb5e2d361a48076342acdf
Author: Davanum Srinivas <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Mar 26 13:42:01 2015 -0400

    Documenting additional vmware permission needed
    
    New permission required: Extension.Register
    
    This was introduced by Change I1046576c448704841ae8e1800b8390e947b0d457 that uses
    ExtensionManager.RegisterExtension, which requires the additional permission
    Extension.Register on the vSphere server.
    
    Closes-Bug: #1384309
    Change-Id: I1184e4b2edd0dfbf4cd29113489ae628b648b57f
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/openstack-manuals 15.0.0 release.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack
